mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS ( USER_NAME, USER_ID, NAME, BIRTHDAY, MAIL_ADDRESS, TELL, ADDRESS, PASSWORD, AUTHORITY, STATE, PRICE ) VALUES ( #{entity.userName}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.birthday}, #{entity.mailAddress}, #{entity.tell}, #{entity.address}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.authority}, #{entity.state}, #{entity.price} )
